name: warnner-performance-test
description: Projeto de testes de Performance e Stress

scripts.test-exemplo-smoke: webpack && cross-env K6_TEST_TYPE=smoke K6_WEB_DASHBOARD=true K6_WEB_DASHBOARD_EXPORT=src/reports/test-exemplo-smoke.html k6 run dist/exemplo-test.js --summary-export=src/reports/test-exemplo-smoke.json
scripts.test-exemplo-spike: webpack && cross-env K6_TEST_TYPE=spike K6_WEB_DASHBOARD=true K6_WEB_DASHBOARD_EXPORT=src/reports/test-exemplo-spike.html k6 run dist/exemplo-test.js --summary-export=src/reports/test-exemplo-spike.json
scripts.test-exemplo-stress: webpack && cross-env K6_TEST_TYPE=stress K6_WEB_DASHBOARD=true K6_WEB_DASHBOARD_EXPORT=src/reports/test-exemplo-stress.html k6 run dist/exemplo-test.js --summary-export=src/reports/test-exemplo-stress.json
scripts.test-exemplo-break: webpack && cross-env K6_TEST_TYPE=break K6_WEB_DASHBOARD=true K6_WEB_DASHBOARD_EXPORT=src/reports/test-exemplo-break.html k6 run dist/exemplo-test.js --summary-export=src/reports/test-exemplo-break.json
scripts.test-exemplo-average-load: webpack && cross-env K6_TEST_TYPE=averageLoad K6_WEB_DASHBOARD=true K6_WEB_DASHBOARD_EXPORT=src/reports/test-exemplo-average-load.html k6 run dist/exemplo-test.js --summary-export=src/reports/test-exemplo-average-load.json

author: warnner
